operations.name: open_app
operations.description: Opens a specified application on the user's system.

operations.name: custom_search
operations.description: Performs a web search using Google Custom Search JSON API, with options to restrict to a site and limit results.

operations.name: file_search
operations.description: Searches for files in a specified path matching the query text.

operations.name: powerbi_generate_dashboard
operations.description: Generates a Power BI dashboard from a CSV file based on a user query describing desired visuals.

operations.name: rag_search
operations.description: Performs a semantic search using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) on indexed documents.

operations.name: run_command
operations.description: Runs a shell command in a sandboxed environment and returns output.

operations.name: summarize_text
operations.description: Summarizes the provided text to a specified maximum length.

operations.name: translate_text
operations.description: Translates the provided text to the target language.

operations.name: web_search
operations.description: Performs a general web search for the query and returns results.

operations.name: create_event
operations.description: Creates a new calendar event with title, start/end times, and optional attendees/location.

operations.name: delete_event
operations.description: Deletes a specified calendar event by ID.

operations.name: read_event
operations.description: Reads details of a calendar event by ID.

operations.name: update_event
operations.description: Updates an existing calendar event by ID.

operations.name: document_summarize
operations.description: Summarizes the content of a PDF, Word, or text file based on the user query.

operations.name: document_translate
operations.description: Translates the content of a PDF, Word, or text file to the specified target language.

operations.name: search_files
operations.description: Searches for files (PDF, DOCX, TXT) using keywords or semantic content matching.
operations.preview: list of files with paths, titles, and content snippets
